author: IGN
description:
As 2025 comes to a close, we’re looking ahead to what’s shaping up to be one of the biggest years in gaming yet. This video breaks down the most anticipated game releases currently planned for 2026, from massive blockbusters like GTA 6 to long-awaited sequels, remakes, new IPs, and surprise returns across every major platform. While release dates are always subject to change, this is a snapshot of what the next year in games could look like right now.
 
This roundup covers the biggest games coming in 2026, including confirmed releases, major exclusives, and high-profile projects with 2026 launch windows. From RPGs, shooters, and fighting games to indie standouts and live-service titles, we highlight what’s coming to PS5, Xbox Series X|S, Switch 2, and PC. If you want to know which games to keep an eye on next year, this is your guide to the biggest video game releases of 2026.

Timecodes:
00:00 Intro, Animal Crossing New Horizons, The Legend of Heroes Trails Beyond the Horizon, Final
title: The Biggest Games Coming in 2026
